title: Are any philosophers discussing the ontology of virtual reality? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suppose. It is partly a technological question. From my work: What is the most disturbing experience you've had with artificial intelligence (AI)? How can we find out if we can glitch the matrix? What kind of cracks or gateways exist in our simulated reality? Data Science Psychic Windows The Computer On others' work: Peter-Paul Verbeek The General Systems Theory of J.T. Velikovsky History of Computers (incl future) Quantum Computers Programmable Heuristics
